name: Pacman Ghost Hama Bead Brooch
description:
Perfect as cute accessory, little gift and as party favors.
These are made of hama beads, non-toxic fused beads, in bright colors.
Each pacman ghost is fixed with a silver coloured metal pin with safety clasp. 

**These are not ready made, therefore you will have to wait a couple of days for me to iron, let them set and affix brooch pin to them with strong bonding glues.

**BUY 4 and you will get another little ghostie free (random colour)

name: Space Invaders Hama Bead Brooch
description:
A statement accessory, perfect for any geeky gamer or nostalgic soul! 
This 8-bit badge has a silver swing back badge attached for easy wear as a brooch.

**These are not ready made, therefore you will have to wait a couple of days for me to iron them, let them set and affix brooch pins to them with strong bonding glues before dispatching.

**BUY 3 and you will get another space invader free

name: Hand painted Galaxy Planets Tee
description:
Hand customised galaxy planets tee
Designs made on brand new t-shirts purchased from American Apparel 

Available in sizes XS, S, M , L, XL 
(do check your measurements to avoid any mistakes later on.)
**Specify colours/ amount of planets in notes to seller

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
If you would like a different design, colour of tee,  long sleeve or pullover please feel free to message me for a custom listing or just ask any questions.

** as they are handmade, each will be different, it just adds to its uniqueness.
please note it will usually take (from 9-15 days for me to purchase, make and dispatch your t-shirt), then postage time must be added on to this depending on shipping option.
